Uses of Class
bayou.http.HttpServerConf

  • Packages that use HttpServerConf 
    Package Description
    bayou.http
    Http server.

    • Uses of HttpServerConf in bayou.http

      Whether to handle conditional requests automatically.

      Timeout for closing a connection.
